title: Crayon Shin-chan: Ora's Dinosaur Diary
description: After a theme park that revives extinct dinosaurs is opened in Tokyo, Shinnosuke's pet dog, Shiro, crosses paths with a small dinosaur. The two befriend each other, but their friendship might affect the existence of the park.

title: PSI Arjun
description: PSI Arjun is an upcoming Indian Marathi-language action-thriller film directed by Bhushan Patel and produced by Vikram Shankar and Dhruv Das under the banners of Vistromax Entertainment and Dreamweaver Entertainment. Distributed by Cinépolis India, the film is scheduled for a wide theatrical release on 9 May 2025. The story and screenplay are written by Sandip Dandawa... Read all

title: Prince and Family
description: Introverted bridal boutique owner, Prince, the town's most eligible bachelor, marries his polar opposite. Chaos and comedy ensue as their contrasting personalities clash in rural Kerala.

title: Majhi Prarthana
description: Two hearts unite in British-ruled rural India. Golya and Prarthana's pure love faces mounting obstacles as betrayal lurks in the shadows of their small village.

title: The Networker
description: After his MLM company fails, Aditya partners with networker Lallan and friend Raghav to launch new ventures backed by Pradhan. They hire a motivational speaker and fake MD before absconding to Dubai with investors' money.

title: Vishwambara
description: A newborn prince embarks on an extraordinary odyssey traversing the realms of deities, mortals, and the afterlife.

title: Daskath
description: Courageous Shekhar challenges a tyrannical village leader in corrupt Kepula Palke, igniting a transformative fight for justice and human dignity.

title: Jai Mata ji - lets Rock
description: An 80-year-old woman faces four wild options after a government program disrupts her life: revenge on family, rekindling romance, living luxuriously, or choosing it all in this comedy about family surprises.

title: Naale Rajaa Koli Majaa
description: On the day of Gandhi Jayanti, when meat sale is prohibited nationwide, an 11-year-old girl goes on a quirky adventure in pursuit of a forbidden chicken curry.

title: ARI (My Name is Nobody)
description: A man puts up an advertisement on social media claiming 'any wish is fulfilled' . Six people, each embodying Anger, Lust, Pride, Greed, Jealousy, and Attachment seek his help. Explores whether their desires will be realized.

title: Kaliyugam 2064
description: Follows an apocalyptic world deprived of food, water and humanity set in 2064, where they must fight to survive.

title: Final Destination: Bloodlines
description: Plagued by a recurring violent nightmare, a college student returns home to find the one person who can break the cycle and save her family from the horrific fate that inevitably awaits them.

title: Eleven
description: A brave and skilled officer with a strong record of solving tough cases is assigned to a new, more challenging serial killing investigation.

title: Narivetta
description: A global examination of state-sanctioned violence through policing, exploring how power structures meant to protect citizens can transform into systems of control, particularly affecting marginalized communities.

title: Bhram
description: In this gripping psychological thriller, Maya, a 42-year-old dementia patient, becomes entangled in a murder mystery within her own home. As the sole potential witness, she struggles to distinguish between reality and illusion. With her memories blurring and time running out, Maya must untangle her fragmented mind to uncover the killer's identity.

title: Pune Highway
description: Three friends who have grown up together in the same building in Mumbai are affected, in different ways, by a dead body found 200 kms away in a lake. As they fight for their friendship, they can't escape the ugly truth racing towards them

title: Surprise
description: Two stylish thieves head to Goa with stolen riches. Picking up a stranger who recognizes one of them turns their escape into a dangerous web of lies - revealing dark secrets beyond their heist.

title: Lovely
description: A young man develops an unexpected friendship with a talking housefly.

title: Suswagatam Khushamadeed
description: "Suswagatam Khushamadeed" intends to spread a message of love, friendship and compassion elements that glue a society together. The film will fulfil the much required love , support and humour in this dark times.

title: Khavis
description: In a remote, underdeveloped village in Maharashtra, chaos erupts when a series of bizarre and mysterious events unfold in the nearby forest. A village head teams up with a tantrik, six armed and intoxicated friends go on a hunt, and a girl secretly stalks another with murderous intent. A gunfight breaks out, leading to a death and a hasty cover-up. When two policemen ... Read all

title: 23 (Iravai Moodu)
description: 23 is a gripping social drama inspired by true events, including the 1992 Ksunduru massacre, the 1993 Chilakaluripet bus burning, and the 1997 Jubilee Hills bomb blasts. It explores themes of violence, justice, and societal unrest.

title: Enna Nu Rehna Sehna Ni Aaunda
Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning
description: Our lives are the sum of our choices. Tom Cruise is Ethan Hunt in Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning.

title: 2020 Delhi
description: 2020 Delhi, India's first one-shot feature, inspired by anti-CAA protests, the 2020 Delhi riots, and the conspiracies surrounding them, while also highlighting the plight of Hindu minorities in Pakistan and Bangladesh. a story of survival.

title: Lilo & Stitch
description: A lonely Hawaiian girl befriends a runaway alien, helping to mend her fragmented family.

title: Kesari Veer
description: The movie narrates the tale of Hamirji Gohil, a brave warrior who fought against the Tughlaq Empire to protect the Somnath Temple and the Hindu faith.

title: Kapkapiii
description: A clique of friends, seeking for a thrill, use an ouija board to connect a ghost for fun. But they soon realized that their house has become haunted by an advent of a female spirit

title: The Confession
description: The film is based on the famous Father Benedict-Mariakutty case that happened in Kerala in 1966. Marie's ravaged dead body was found in the thickets and all evidences pointed to Father Benedict's involvement in the case. In a stirring conflict of conscience and faith, Benedict refuses to divulge the confession that Marie had made to him. Benedict becomes the first pri... Read all

title: Bramhaarjun
description: Bramhaarjun is an Action Thriller Film directed by Souvik Dey and written by Ranti Dev Das and Souvik Dey. It stars Anindya Sengupta, Rohan Bhattacharjee and Priyanka Bhattacharjee in leading roles.

title: Agar Magar Kintu Lekin Parantu
description: Amal's story whisks the audience back to their childhood, where the small window of his home transforms into a portal of imagination, enabling him to soar into the vast sky and escape the confines of his world.

title: Power Star 2024
description: An arrogant film superstar's perfect life crumbles after a pivotal incident, forcing him to confront a notorious crime boss and overcome mounting obstacles.

title: Tomchi
description: Six troublemaking kids change their ways after befriending a dog named Tomchi. Upon learning he belongs to someone else, they plan to return him - but Tomchi gets stolen, sparking their search to find and return him.

title: Detective Ujjwalan
description: In the village of Plaachikkaavu, a local detective, Ujjwalan, must outsmart a mysterious figure in a deadly battle of wits, where his skills are put to the ultimate test.

title: Vaama: Ladhai Sanmanachi
description: Sarla dreams of becoming an IAS officer. Her husband's promise to support her education proves false. Despite facing abuse and trying to save her marriage, she ultimately chooses self-respect over compromise.

title: Dilli Dark
description: Michael Okeke, a Nigerian student living in New Delhi wants to get his MBA and settle in India - but his part-time job gives him a dubious double life in a city notoriously difficult for outsiders.

title: Gumnam Hai Koi
description: Ila lives a wealthy lifestyle in Mumbai along with her dad, Lajpat, and step-mother, Mamta. When Billa DeCosta attempts to molest Ila, locks up Lajpat in another room, Mamta comes to her rescue, gets injured, but summons Inspector Veer Singh, who chases Billa away. A grateful Lajpat decides to make both daughter and wife heirs to his estate. Shortly thereafter he is k... Read all

title: Karate Kid: Legends
description: After kung fu prodigy Li Fong relocates to New York City, he attracts unwanted attention from a local karate champion and embarks on a journey to enter the ultimate karate competition with the help of Mr. Han and Daniel LaRusso.

title: Hari Hara Veera Mallu
description: The first Indian to orchestrate a revolt against the Mughal empire. The early life of Veera Mallu and the mission he chooses to raise revolution against the ghastly actions of the army generals in the Mughal empire.

title: Mr. & Mrs. 420 Again (Part 3)
description: Balli, film director, looks for a surrogate mother.Jass, a struggling actor, auditions as Reshma, an item girl and is chosen.Jagga, fleeing from MLA, disguises himself as Jugni.Balli contact Reshma for surrogacy,but his wife contacts Jugni

title: Shubhchintak
description: Novice Meghna and her two accomplices plot to honey trap Sanjay for revenge, facing humorous and moral challenges. Will she let revenge consume her?

title: Bombay
description: Ulas Mhatre, an underworld don operates activities with his trusted members Nana, Tatya, and Sherry. Things changes when Tatya goes missing with no evidence.

title: From the World of John Wick: Ballerina
description: An assassin trained in the traditions of the Ruska Roma organization sets out to seek revenge after her father's death.

title: Rudra
description: Plot is being kept under wraps now.

title: Jarann
description: In a remote village, a family's life spirals into chaos as they become entangled in the dark world of witchcraft and ancient superstitions. As fear, mystery, and psychological turmoil take over, a woman at the center of it all must confront the terrifying truth behind the rituals and her own identity. Jarann delves deep into human emotions and the haunting consequence... Read all

title: Criminal King of Hajipur
description: A cunning criminal mastermind, known as the "Kidnapping King," executes intricate plans where victims remain unaware of their abductions.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
description: As an ancient threat endangers both Vikings and dragons alike on the isle of Berk, the friendship between Hiccup, an inventive Viking, and Toothless, a Night Fury dragon, becomes the key to both species forging a new future together.

title: Materialists
description: A matchmaker's lucrative business is complicated when she falls into a toxic love triangle that threatens her clients.

title: Adipoli
description: Aakash, a successful advertising firm owner, finds his life and business systematically dismantled by an unknown woman who relentlessly targets him.

title: Sitaare Zameen Par
description: After a DUI, an arrogant basketball coach must train Neurodivergent adults for community service. His initial prejudice fades as his players show him a new perspective on life.

title: Kuberaa
description: Revolves around the pursuit of wealth and its consequences: a beggar undergoes a dramatic transformation, exploring themes of greed, ambition, and moral dilemmas faced by the characters leading to a quest for redemption.

title: Rekkai Mulaithen
description: The son of Tamil Nadu's top garment owner goes missing. A secret police probe uncovers shocking twists. Rekkai Mulaithen reveals why he was kidnapped, what happened to him, and whether he's still alive.

title: Kadukka
description: In a peaceful village, two young best friends fall for the same beautiful girl. What starts as friendship soon turns into a comedy-filled love war. Each tries to win her heart with charm, tricks, and emotions, but the girl has a surprise of her own.

title: Shootout at Byculla
description: It would be Based On JJ Hospital Shootout Story in 1992. Arun Gawli Gang Killed Haseena parkar's husband And later how Dawood Ibrahim gang took avenge from Gawli Gang.

title: F1
description: A Formula One driver comes out of retirement to mentor and team with a younger driver.

title: M3GAN 2.0
description: Two years after M3GAN's rampage, her creator, Gemma, resorts to resurrecting her infamous creation in order to take down Amelia, the military-grade weapon who was built by a defense contractor who stole M3GAN's underlying tech.

title: Kannappa
description: An atheist hunter Kannappa becomes a devotee of Lord Shiva and plucked out his eyes in an act of devotion.

title: Gyanvapi Files: A Tailor's Murder Story
description: The film based on murder of Kanhaiya Lal Sahu.

title: Geetha Pilusthondi
description: An abandoned wife dies alone battling cancer-but her spirit lingers. When three young men rent her flat, the haunting begins. As fear spreads, a Swamiji intervenes - but is Geetha's vengeance truly over-or just beginning?

title: Jurassic World Rebirth
description: Five years post-Jurassic World Dominion, an expedition braves isolated equatorial regions to extract DNA from three massive prehistoric creatures for a groundbreaking medical breakthrough.

title: Thammudu
description: A brother who goes to any extent to safeguard his sister from multiple challenges in her life. Explores the beautiful bonding between siblings and how they overcome misunderstandings to continue their relationship

title: Metro.... In Dino
description: Follows stories of bittersweet relationships in a contemporary setting, exploring various aspects, hues, and moods of love.

title: Superman
description: Follows the titular superhero as he reconciles his heritage with his human upbringing. He is the embodiment of truth, justice and the human way in a world that views this as old-fashioned.

title: Maalik
description: Maalik is a gangster drama starring Rajkummar Rao that is expected to be a gripping story about a man's rise to power in the underworld. The film is based on social issues and is expected to be full of action and adventure.

title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
description: A group of friends is terrorized by a stalker who knows about a gruesome incident from their past.

title: Smurfs
description: When Papa Smurf is taken by evil wizards Razamel and Gargamel, Smurfette leads the Smurfs on a mission to the real world to save him.

title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps
description: Forced to balance their roles as heroes with the strength of their family bond, the Fantastic Four must defend Earth from a ravenous space god called Galactus and his enigmatic Herald, Silver Surfer.

title: Param Sundari
description: In Kerala's picturesque backwaters, a North Indian and South Indian find unexpected love. Their cultural differences spark a hilarious and chaotic romance, full of twists and turns. Two diverse worlds collide in a heartwarming story.

title: The Naked Gun
description: Only one man has the particular set of skills - to lead Police Squad and save the world.

title: Mirai
description: A warrior is tasked with the protection nine sacred scriptures that can turn any mortal into a deity.

title: Weapons
description: When all but one child from the same class mysteriously vanish on the same night at exactly the same time, a community is left questioning who or what is behind their disappearance.

title: Coolie
description: Delves into a man's relentless quest for vengeance since youth, driven by righting past wrongs, shaping his very existence. Viewers experience the complexities of his tumultuous vendetta journey.

title: Vibe
description: A friendship that stays strong against all obstacles.

title: Kashi to Kashmir
description: The most awaited Film based on Article 370 and Kashmiri Pandits forced flee from Kashmir valley in 1990 . Its not a love story, this tells what happened then in Kashmir Valley and thereafter.

title: Run Bhola Run
description: This is a story of two criminals who have just escaped from jail and are now on the run.

description: The Demon Slayer Corps plunge into Infinity Castle to defeat Muzan. However, the remaining Hashira and the Demon Slayers who survived Tanjiro's Final Selection are pitted against the last of the Twelve Kizuki first.

title: Go Goa Gone 2
description: Sequel of the 2013 'zom-com' film Go Goa Gone.

title: Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
description: The inspirational journey of the Legend, Missile Man and 11th People's President of India.

title: Vrusshabha
description: What happens if two sworn enemies from a previous life are reborn as father-son in a new birth? What wins - love or revenge?

title: Thama
description: A well-known and determined historian, he examines ancient manuscripts for clues to the mysterious vampire legends of Vijay Nagar.

title: Predator: Badlands
description: A young Predator outcast from his clan finds an unlikely ally on his journey in search of the ultimate adversary.

title: The Magnetic Fighters
description:
This story is based on martial arts and all the characters and incidents of this story are fictional. The purpose of this story is to promote martial arts and we aim to keep this ancient art and spread it all over the world.

description: Jake and Neytiri's family grapples with grief after Neteyam's death, encountering a new, aggressive Na'vi tribe, the Ash People, who are led by the fiery Varang, as the conflict on Pandora escalates and a new moral focus emerges.

title: Aadu 3
description: Plot unknown. Third installment of the Aadu series.

title: The SpongeBob Movie: Search for Squarepants
description: SpongeBob and his friends Patrick, Squidward, Sandy, and Mr. Krabs journey to the ocean's depths to face the Flying Dutchman's ghost, encountering challenges and uncovering marine mysteries.

title: Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri
Toxic
description: Set in a bygone era, this gripping tale unfolds in the coastal paradise of Goa, where a powerful drug cartel pulls the strings behind a facade of sun-soaked beaches and vibrant culture.

description: In 1980s rural Andhra Pradesh, A spirited villager unites his community through sports to defend their pride against a powerful rival.

title: The Singing Priest
description: The story chronicles Rob Galea's transformative path from a struggling artist to a celebrated musician, driven by unwavering passion and remarkable talent, culminating in his rise to fame on the X-Factor stage.
